sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.machinery

Class MachineryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.machinery.MachineryController

  • public class MachineryController
extends java.lang.Object
    This object controls the Change State use case.
    Version:
    3.0 5/07/2003
    Author:
    Olivo Miotto, Pang Ping Li

    • Field Summary

      MainController mainCtrl
      This attribute reference to the MainController
      StoreController storeCtrl
      This attribute reference to the StoreController

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MachineryController(MainController mctrl)
      This constructor creates an instance of MachineryController.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeDown()
      This method will close down the machinery functions of the vending machine.
      void closeMachineryPanel()
      This method close down the MachineryPanel.
      void dispenseDrink(int idx)
      This method instructs the DrinksStore to dispense one drink, and then updates the MachinerySimulatorPanel.. It returns TRUE or FALSE to indicate whether dispensing was successful.
      void displayCoinStock()
      This method update coin stock view after transfer all cash. This method will get the stock values of coin denominations from the CashStore and display them on the MachinerySimulatorPanel.
      void displayDoorState()
      This method displays the current Door status (open or closed) on the Door Status display.
      void displayDrinkStock()
      This method update drink stock view. This method will get the stock values of drinks brands from the Drinks Store and display them on the Machinery SimulatorPanel.
      void displayMachineryPanel()
      This method displays and initializes the MachinerySimulatorPanel.
      MainController getMainController()
      This method returns the MainController.
      void giveChange(int idx, int numOfCoins)
      This method instructs the CashStore to issue a number of coins of a specific denomination, and hen updates the MachinerySimulatorPanel. It returns TRUE or FALSE to indiate whether the change issue was successful.
      void initialize()
      This method creates the Door.
      boolean isDoorClosed()
      This method determine whether the door is closed.
      void refreshMachineryDisplay()
      This method refresh the MachinerySimulatorPanel.
      void setDoorState(boolean state)
      This method set the door state and display the door state.
      void storeCoin(Coin c)
      This method will instruct the CashStore to store the Coin sent as input, and update the display on the MachinerySimulatorPanel.

        This method returns the MainController.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws VMCSException
        This method creates the Door.
        Throws:
        VMCSException - if fails to instantiate Door.

      • closeDown

        public void closeDown()
        This method will close down the machinery functions of the vending machine.

      • displayMachineryPanel

        public void displayMachineryPanel()
        This method displays and initializes the MachinerySimulatorPanel.

      • closeMachineryPanel

        public void closeMachineryPanel()
        This method close down the MachineryPanel.

      • isDoorClosed

        public boolean isDoorClosed()
        This method determine whether the door is closed.

      • setDoorState

        public void setDoorState(boolean state)
        This method set the door state and display the door state.
        Parameters:
        state - TRUE to set the state to open, otherwise, set the state to closed.

      • displayDoorState

        public void displayDoorState()
        This method displays the current Door status (open or closed) on the Door Status display.

      • displayDrinkStock

        public void displayDrinkStock()
                       throws VMCSException
        This method update drink stock view. This method will get the stock values of drinks brands from the Drinks Store and display them on the Machinery SimulatorPanel.
        Throws:
        VMCSException - if fail to update drinks store display.

      • displayCoinStock

        public void displayCoinStock()
                      throws VMCSException
        This method update coin stock view after transfer all cash. This method will get the stock values of coin denominations from the CashStore and display them on the MachinerySimulatorPanel.
        Throws:
        VMCSException - if fail to update cash store display.

      • storeCoin

        public void storeCoin(Coin c)
               throws VMCSException
        This method will instruct the CashStore to store the Coin sent as input, and update the display on the MachinerySimulatorPanel.
        Throws:
        VMCSException - if fail to update cash store display.

      • dispenseDrink

        public void dispenseDrink(int idx)
                   throws VMCSException
        This method instructs the DrinksStore to dispense one drink, and then updates the MachinerySimulatorPanel.. It returns TRUE or FALSE to indicate whether dispensing was successful.
        Parameters:
        idx - the index of the drinks store item.
        Throws:
        VMCSException - if fail to update cash store display.

      • giveChange

        public void giveChange(int idx,
                       int numOfCoins)
                throws VMCSException
        This method instructs the CashStore to issue a number of coins of a specific denomination, and hen updates the MachinerySimulatorPanel. It returns TRUE or FALSE to indiate whether the change issue was successful.
        Parameters:
        idx - the index of the cash store item.
        numOfCoins - the number of coins to change.
        Throws:
        VMCSException - if fail to update cash store display.

      • refreshMachineryDisplay

        public void refreshMachineryDisplay()
        This method refresh the MachinerySimulatorPanel.
